sheet.text: I saw a tower like this on Kronos Island. What did the Ancients use it for?
This was an observation tower. Its main function was to send out radio signals to detect the enemy hunting them down from space.
Once the enemy's presence was detected, the defense systems on the Starfall Islands were automatically triggered. Do you recall the tower on Rhea Island? This is similar.
The tower here on Ouranos Island has already been activated. The great threat that destroyed the Ancients is near.
